newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia Cen Bank stays away from govt paper market.
newsitem.headline: Russia Cen Bank stays away from govt paper market.

text.p: The central bank did not intervene on the government securities market on behalf of the Finance Ministry on Monday, the bank's open-market operations department said.

Apart from intervening on its own account for liquidity-smoothing and monetary policy purposes, the central bank buys and sells securities as part of its management of the Finance Ministry's debt and asset portfolio.
Full details of recent central bank transactions in the secondary market for the Finance Ministry can be seen on CBGKOSEC.
